scene_end_anchor: Arthur 'Artie' Penhaligon is currently in the office breakroom, having reached a breaking point with his corporate routine. He has just attempted to purchase a snack, only for the vending machine to malfunction and trap his food. He is now standing before the machine, prepared to retrieve his property by any means necessary.

next_action: Artie attempts to retrieve a stuck bag of chips from the faulty vending machine, leading to a physical struggle.
